page.title: 09 Broadgate Farm
page.content:
We visited Broadgate Farm which has been used by Hilliers Nursery for growing trees and shrubs for many years. This year they have sold the land and it may not be farmed for many more years.
The land manager showed us round. He pointed out all the different species of trees they were growing. He said the land was very difficult to use because it was clay in one field and sand in another and some fields were all mixed up.
We had to be careful in one field of trees because they had been sprayed with a pesticide.
There is still a farmhouse there but it does not belong to the farmland anymore.
